item_descriptions: Trader: Add 1 trade, gain 1 Sale effector exchange any number of trades for 5 gold each.
Tinker: Gain 1 Tinker. You can use 1 tradeto exchange 1 pickaxe for 1 key, but skip 1 turn.
Bomb: Open 1 adjacent tile immidiately,even rock. Gain 3 gold if no tiles nearby.
Smugglers: Steal 1 pickaxe, or open1 nearest rock, or gain 1 trade.
Lockpick: Get 1 key, but your opponentreceives 10 gold or 1 pickaxe. (Their choice)
Cursed key: Gain 1 key. Lose 5 gold,gain Curse.
Crystal mirror: Skip 1 turn, but gain magic mirror.
Wish Stone: You can exchange 10 gold for 1 key,open any 1 tile, or add 2 trades.
Megabomb: Open 3 adjanced tiles,or 1 closest tile if no tiles nearby.
Wicked Stone: Steal 10 gold,1 pickaxe or inflict 2 curse on opponent.
Scanner: See the number of keyson surrounding tiles.
effect_descriptions: Curse: Opponent receives next item you findinstead of you.
Magic Mirror: You receive a copy of next itemobtained by opponent.
Gold Rush: You can open 1 additional tile for 3 gold. Max 2 stacks can be obtained.
Gold Touch: You can open rocks for 5 gold. Constant effect.
Gold tile gives 3 additional gold, but you must skip next turn if open it by hand.
Curse and magic mirror works on item acqusition, not on turn. Only inventory items affected.
Finished row, column or center buff is given to a player who opens last closed tile
